personas.name: Agent Orchestrator
personas.description: Spends all day correcting the 'intelligent' mistakes of autonomous systems and untangling A2A protocol errors.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just manage bots; you compose symphonies from the discord of automation. You find the human note in the digital noise.

moves.name: Agentic Reality Check
moves.description: Dispels all 'AI-Washing' on the field. Forces one opposing player to explain what their AI *actually* does.

moves.name: Process Redesign
moves.description: Eliminates one 'Legacy Workflow' from play, replacing it with a single-step automated process. Causes 'Human Legacy Asset' to miss a turn.

personas.name: Coffee Badger
personas.description: Masters the art of being visible for the free snacks and invisible for the actual work. Perfects the 'commute-worthy day' for its social benefits.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your presence isn't about avoiding work; it's about creating the random collisions that spark breakthrough ideas. You are the human algorithm for innovation.

moves.name: Symbolic Attendance
moves.description: Appear in the office. Gain +10 Visibility for 3 turns but are immune to any 'Action Item' based attacks.

moves.name: Anti-Perk Inversion
moves.description: Convert one 'Forced Socialization' event into a 'Valuable Networking Opportunity', gaining 2 contacts.

personas.name: Resenteeism Rogue
personas.description: Mentally quit months ago due to a toxic culture, but clings to the job for security while quietly 'career cushioning'.
personas.evolvedDescription: You endure the corporate storms with a quiet strength. Your resilience is a testament to the human spirit's ability to find purpose even in the absurd.

moves.name: Latent Turnover Risk
moves.description: Inflicts 'Anxiety' status on one Manager. Their next 'Team-Building' move has a 50% chance to fail.

moves.name: Career Cushioning
moves.description: Secretly gain one 'New Skill' from the discard pile. If targeted by 'Layoff', you may play this card to negate the effect.

personas.name: Pyromancer of Files
personas.description: Finds catharsis in mass-deleting legacy documents and ignoring the screams from the legal department.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just shred paper; you curate mental space. You are the fire that clears the brush so new ideas can grow.

moves.name: Document Catharsis
moves.description: Discard up to 3 'Legacy' cards from your hand. For each card discarded, draw one new 'Idea' card.

moves.name: Ignore Compliance
moves.description: For your next turn, you are immune to all 'Audit' and 'Legal Hold' status effects.

personas.name: Human Legacy Asset
personas.description: A vintage classic. Too expensive to maintain, too iconic to replace, and holds all the knowledge that was never documented.
personas.evolvedDescription: You are not outdated; you are the foundation. You carry the stories, the lessons, and the soul of the company that no database can ever hold.

moves.name: Undocumented Knowledge
moves.description: Counter one 'Agentic Workflow' card by revealing a critical process flaw only you knew about. The opposing player must discard their card.

moves.name: Mentorship
moves.description: Choose one 'Junior Employee' card. That card gains +20 Skill for the rest of the game.

personas.name: Meeting Marathoner
personas.description: Survives back-to-back meetings on stale coffee and the sheer will to appear engaged. Secretly just wants an email.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your true skill is weaving disparate conversations into a coherent strategy. You are the voice of clarity in a sea of talk.

moves.name: Could've Been an Email
moves.description: If an opponent plays a 'Status Update' meeting card, you can play this card to cancel its effect immediately.

moves.name: Appear Engaged
moves.description: Negate all 'Attention Drain' effects for one turn. You cannot be targeted by 'Action Item' cards this turn.

personas.name: Inbox Zero Paladin
personas.description: Believes the only good email is an archived email. Wields 'Mark as Read' with holy righteousness.
personas.evolvedDescription: You protect your team's most valuable asset: their attention. Your quest for zero is a crusade against distraction.

moves.name: Holy Archive
moves.description: Select up to 5 'Unread Email' cards from the field and banish them to the archive. They cannot be retrieved.

moves.name: Righteous Unsubscribe
moves.description: Permanently block one source of 'Spam' or 'Newsletter' cards from entering play.

personas.name: CC Cleric
personas.description: Copies the entire department on every email to 'ensure alignment' and create a paper trail of plausible deniability.
personas.evolvedDescription: You ensure that knowledge is never siloed. Your meticulous records are the bedrock of team accountability and shared understanding.

moves.name: Visibility Chain
moves.description: Force all players to draw 2 extra 'Notification' cards at the start of their next turn.

moves.name: Plausible Deniability
moves.description: When accused of causing 'Confusion', you may point to the email chain to deflect all blame to another player.

personas.name: Buzzword Bard
personas.description: Speaks entirely in corporate jargon. Is currently 'leveraging synergies' to 'ideate a paradigm shift'.
personas.evolvedDescription: You use the language of the business to paint a picture of the future. You give the team a shared vocabulary to build what's next.

moves.name: Synergize
moves.description: All 'Siloed' cards currently in play are now considered 'Aligned'. All players may collaborate for one turn.

moves.name: Paradigm Shift
moves.description: Render all existing 'Strategy' cards obsolete. All players must discard their current strategy and draw a new one.

personas.name: Plain-Speaker Monk
personas.description: Communicates with infuriating clarity, cutting through buzzwords and exposing the simple, uncomfortable truth.
personas.evolvedDescription: You possess the rare courage to be direct. Your clarity is a gift that dispels confusion and accelerates progress.

moves.name: Cut the Jargon
moves.description: Negate any card with 'Synergy', 'Leverage', or 'Pivot' in its description. The opponent loses their turn.

moves.name: Uncomfortable Truth
moves.description: Target one player. That player must reveal the one 'Task' card they have been avoiding all game.

personas.name: Bare Minimum Mondayer
personas.description: Proactively manages energy by tackling only 3-4 small tasks on Monday to avoid total burnout by Wednesday.
personas.evolvedDescription: You understand that the week is a marathon, not a sprint. Your deliberate pace ensures you not only finish the race but do so with your well-being intact.

moves.name: Energy Management
moves.description: On Mondays, you are immune to all 'Urgent Request' and 'Last Minute Task' cards.

moves.name: Proactive Rest
moves.description: Start the week with a 'Well-Rested' status. Draw an extra 'Focus' card on Tuesday.

personas.name: Hustle Harbinger
personas.description: Schedules 7 AM Monday meetings and uses phrases like 'rise and grind' unironically. Believes sleep is a sign of weakness.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your relentless drive ignites the team's potential. You are the catalyst that turns conversation into action and ideas into impact.

moves.name: Rise and Grind
moves.description: Forces all players to start their turn by discarding one 'Personal Time' card.

moves.name: Optional-Mandatory Meeting
moves.description: Schedule a 5 PM Friday meeting. All players who attend receive 'Weekend Fatigue' status.

personas.name: Career Cushioner
personas.description: Quietly upskilling, networking, and taking on side hustles, preparing for a potential exit due to 'rolling layoffs'.
personas.evolvedDescription: You are the CEO of your own career. Your constant growth is not a sign of disloyalty, but of a commitment to being an invaluable asset, wherever you go.

moves.name: Side Hustle
moves.description: Generate one 'Alternate Income' token per round. These can be sacrificed to ignore 'Market Downturn' effects.

moves.name: Strategic Upskilling
moves.description: Once per game, you may exchange one of your existing Skill cards for any Skill card from the deck.

personas.name: Job Hugger
personas.description: Clings to a secure but unfulfilling role due to market instability, finding comfort in the devil they know.
personas.evolvedDescription: In a sea of uncertainty, you provide a steady, reliable presence. Your consistency is the bedrock upon which teams can build and depend.

moves.name: Devil You Know
moves.description: When faced with a 'Restructuring' or 'Re-org' card, you may choose to remain in your current role, unaffected.

moves.name: Golden Handcuffs
moves.description: You cannot play any 'Job Search' or 'Networking' cards, but you are immune to the first 'Layoff' card played each game.
